review.title: “Definitely a powerful experience for growing. The company has incompetent management from top to bottom.”
review.pros: Pros – Relative autonomy and little oversight
review.cons: Cons – Almost a complete lack of project management. No concrete mandate for my team. Poor hiring practices. Lack of effective communication between levels of management.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – adopt project management. hire better.
